code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{Button,Modal,Table}from'antd';import{dateOptions}from'../../resources';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function HistorialCitas(_ref){let{historial}=_ref;const[isModalOpen,setIsModalOpen]=useState(false);const showModal=()=>{setIsModalOpen(true);};const handleOk=()=>{setIsModalOpen(false);};const handleCancel=()=>{setIsModalOpen(false);};const columns=[{title:'Fecha',dataIndex:'fecha_hora',key:'fecha',render:(_,_ref2)=>{let{fecha_hora}=_ref2;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:new Date(fecha_hora).toLocaleDateString('es-MX',dateOptions)});}},{title:'Hora',dataIndex:'fecha_hora',key:'hora',render:(_,_ref3)=>{let{fecha_hora}=_ref3;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:new Date(fecha_hora).toLocaleTimeString('es-MX')});}},{title:'Servicio',dataIndex:'servicio',key:'age'},{title:'Medico',dataIndex:'medico',key:'medico',render:(_,_ref4)=>{let{medico}=_ref4;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:medico.name});}}];return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{size:"small",type:"link",onClick:showModal,children:"Ver historial completo"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Modal,{title:"Historial de citas",open:isModalOpen,onOk:handleOk,onCancel:handleCancel,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Table,{dataSource:historial,columns:columns}),";"]})]});}
